mapper.select: select sc.subject_category_name, pc.professional_class_name, m.major_id, m.major_name, m.major_code, m.major_year, m.degrees, m.gender, m.avg_salary from tb_academic_level as al join tb_subject_category as sc on al.academic_level_id = sc.academic_level_id join tb_professional_class as pc on sc.subject_category_id = pc.subject_category_id join tb_major as m on pc.professional_class_id = m.professional_class_id where m.major_id = #{majorId}
select m.major_id, m.major_name, m.major_code, m.major_year, m.degrees, m.gender, m.avg_salary from tb_major as m where m.major_name like concat('%', #{majorName}, '%')

select sc.subject_category_name, ps.professional_class_name, m.major_id, m.major_name from tb_academic_level as al join tb_subject_category as sc on al.academic_level_id = sc.academic_level_id join tb_professional_class as ps on sc.subject_category_id = ps.subject_category_id join tb_major as m on ps.professional_class_id = m.professional_class_id
m.major_name like concat('%', #{message}, '%')
limit 5
